subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Stewart Cooper was hired as crew chief for Kyle Petty, taking over the slumping No. 45 Dodge after it missed the past two Nascar Sprint Cup races. Cooper replaced Billy Wilburn. Petty is to return to the driver’s seat after stepping out last week to allow Chad McCumbee a chance to qualify the car at Texas. But McCumbee failed to qualify, just as Petty had done two weeks before in Martinsville, Va.
